title: About Numerical Semigroups
text: This page is intended to collect information about numerical semigroups.

title: Numerical Semigroups
text:
We say that \((S,+)\) is a numerical semigroups if \(S \subseteq \mathbb{N}\) and satisifies the following conditions:

For all \(x,y \in S\), then \(a + b \in S\).
\(0 \in S\).
The set \(\mathbb{N} \setminus S\) is finite.

The first two conditions implies that \((S,+)\) is a submonoid of \((\mathbb{N}, +)\).
